titleStmt.title: A short and true account of the several advances the Church of England hath made towards Rome, or, A model of the grounds upon which the papists for these hundred years have built their hopes and expectations that England would ere long return to popery by Dr. Du-Moulin ...
titleStmt.author: Du Moulin, Lewis, 1606-1680.

titleStmt.title: A short and true account of the several advances the Church of England hath made towards Rome, or, A model of the grounds upon which the papists for these hundred years have built their hopes and expectations that England would ere long return to popery by Dr. Du-Moulin ...

notesStmt.note: Includes: A true report of a discourse between Monsieur de L'Angle ... and Lewis Du Moulin the 10th of February 1678/9. London, 1679--P. [69]-88.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
